verbs.description: [ARG0: small dog] [V: survives] [ARG1: hurricane florence] [ARGM-ADV: floating on a couch for nearly a week] a small white dog named soshe was separated from his owner during hurricane florence his owner was out of state and unable to return to her flooded home she knew her dog was in trouble so she made a humane society instagram youtube twitter dog fox the humane society of missouri hurricane florence soshe facebook los angeles
